thread.title: Ristorante iasg restaurant at the Blythswood - Glasgow, | OpenTable
thread.title_full: Ristorante iasg restaurant at the Blythswood - Glasgow, | OpenTable

author: IainH
text: In summary there were elements of the service that could have been better, but the staff were friendly. The food was very good, but we were only offered a set menu .\n( Sunday lunchtime) . The restaurant area itself was well decorated and maintained but it had the feeling of a large â€œ barn â€œ or canteen and lacked any character , so overall for the money a disappointing experience.
